scripts.importZeeguu: cd src && git clone -b development https://github.com/zeeguu-ecosystem/zeeguu-react.git && cd zeeguu-react/ && npm install
scripts.installAllDependencies: cd src && npm install && cd zeeguu-react/ && npm install
scripts.pub: rm -rf build* && (cd src/zeeguu-react/ && git pull) && cp ./public/manifest.chrome.json ./public/manifest.json && npm-run-all build:* && zip -r build.zip build && open https://chrome.google.com/webstore/devconsole/7f6da896-c12c-4cb3-8ad7-b1641fc8efbc/ckncjmaednfephhbpeookmknhmjjodcd/edit/package
scripts.pubFirefox: rm -rf build* && (cd src/zeeguu-react/ && git pull) && npm run buildFirefox && (cd build && zip -r ../build.zip *) && open https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/
scripts.pub-ci: (cd src && git clone -b development https://github.com/zeeguu-ecosystem/zeeguu-react.git && cd zeeguu-react && npm ci) && cp ./public/manifest.chrome.json ./public/manifest.json && npm-run-all build:* && zip -r build.zip build
scripts.pub-ci-firefox: (cd src && git clone -b development https://github.com/zeeguu-ecosystem/zeeguu-react.git && cd zeeguu-react && npm ci) && npm run buildFirefox && zip -r build.zip build
